data.title: Here are the NFL players who played high school football in NC
data.meta_description: North Carolina has produced a lot of football talent and dozens of former North Carolina high school football players are now playing professionally in the National Football League.
data.text:
North Carolina has produced a lot of football talent and dozens of former North Carolina high school football players are now playing professionally in the National Football League.

North Carolina has produced a lot of football talent and dozens of former North Carolina high school football players are now playing professionally in the National Football League.

HighSchoolOT has covered high school football in North Carolina since 2008, meaning many of the NFL players from North Carolina appeared on HighSchoolOT before they were in the NFL.

Each season, we track the players from North Carolina across all 32 NFL rosters.

How many NFL players are from North Carolina?

After the 2022 NFL Draft, there were 74 players on NFL teams that played high school football at North Carolina high schools. There were an additional 15 free agents from North Carolina high schools.

Current NFL players from North Carolina

{ "name": "footable", "attrs": { "id": "20245773", "identifier": "Active NFL Players", "limit": "15", "all": "Position|Height|Weight|HS City|HS Grad Year|College|Draft Year|Draft Round|Draft Pick|Drafted By", "filter": "true", "on": "last name" }, "children": null }
